content:
I was wondering if there is a way we can use Hatchery or any tutorial on how to do it. I am not able to find the executable or any document on how to extract the .fsh from the structure definitions. Is this something anyone has done before?
I am trying to extract the US core patient profile SD into its corresponding .fsh to begin with.
Think it's very much a work in progress at the moment...

Hatchery exists mainly as an idea right now. We're currently focusing on SUSHI first. That said, I understand that @Rick Geimer did a quick proof-of-concept at the last Connectathon. Rick -- is this something you plan to continue working on?
